resources:
CarPooling Tracking not completed! Tracking not yet completed. The bidder must have completed the tracking. You can close this screen when you have arrived at your destination. After which the points will be validated. Tracking in progress Start tracking Tracking can not be started. If you have OFFERED THE PASSAGE, you can start it 10 minutes before the scheduled time and after 30 minutes. If you have REQUIRED THE PASSAGE you have to wait for the bidder to have the tracking. People you must pass to take When you enter the car, press START TRACKING to synchronize your device with that of the bidder. It is necessary to authorize the bluetooth connection! Bidder data summary You can START TRACKING 10 minutes before the indicated time, up to a maximum of 30 minutes. It is necessary to activate the bluetooth in order to start it. Sign in or sign up Do not have an account?
